1.title: Cici Spectacular
1.plot: Cici is nervous when she is asked to perform a daring stunt before the start of a big race.

2.title: Dodgems
2.plot: Marsha decides to be a mechanic but wears Big Chris out with her endless questions. Disaster strikes when Chris dozes off and doesn't listen to her properly...

3.title: Flash the Marshall
3.plot:

4.title: Tall Story Roary
4.plot: The loudspeaker system is not working at Silver Hatch. How will Roary be stopped from performing a dangerous stunt on the track?

5.title: Hot Stuff
5.plot: Big Chris takes the cars to the beach to relax in the heat but he is so busy dealing with the cars he forgets to drink his water. But hang on, who else has drunk it...

6.title: Car Boot Sale
6.plot: Big Chris has a clear out and takes all his old junk up to Farmer Green's car boot sale but misses the clutter in Rusty. How will he get everything back?

7.title: Horse Powered Dinkie
7.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

8.title: Law and Order
8.plot: Mr Carburettor is fed up with the cars running amok on his track and summons Bill and Nick to restore order to the track. But might our overzealous policeman overstep the mark?

9.title: Flash's Tea Party
9.plot: Flash invites everyone to a tea party, thinking they bring the food with them. Are there going to be a lot of hungry bunnies at Silver Hatch?

10.title: Trucksy's Sleepover
10.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

11.title: Hellie's a Winner
11.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

12.title: Cry Cold
12.plot: Big Chris is feeling ill so Marsha sends him to bed until he is better. Big Chris enjoys the attention rather too much and fails to let everyone know when he is on the mend.

13.title: Marsha's Wonderful Life
13.plot: Marsha overhears the others saying she is too bossy. She decides that Silver hatch would be a better place without her. Chaos swiftly ensues, can Marsha be persuaded to stay, they can't cope without her!

14.title: Let's Hear It for Big Chris
14.plot: Big Chris is working on Loada while the others plan a surprise evening for him for being the longest serving member of Silver Hatch.

15.title: Funny Business
15.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

16.title: Nick Solves the Case
16.plot: PC Pete has been summonsed to get to the bottom of some missing fuel. But where's Nick? And who can solve the case?

17.title: Simply the Best
17.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

18.title: Cici Wins the Day
18.plot: Cici is fed up with never winning and decides not to take part in the race that day. Can Roary persuade her to change her mind?

19.title: Heavy Loada
19.plot: Roary takes Loada on a jaunt to the beach... only to discover that sand and lorries don't mix too well!

20.title: Testing Time for Maxi
20.plot: PC Pete and Nick are up at Silver hatch giving the cars their road tests. Is Maxi really going to be as good as he says he is or will he be unpleasantly surprised?

21.title: Mum's the Word
21.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

22.title: How the Hatch Was Won
22.plot: Tin Top is feeling homesick so Big Chris tries to cheer him up. But who could that pesky varmint causing trouble on the track be?!

23.title: Go Gadget James and Maxi
23.plot: Maxi is jealous of all of James' gadgets, or more precisely, the attention the other cars give him. He persuades Molecom to devise some gadgets for him... with hilarious results

24.title: Mr. Carburretor
24.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

25.title: Home Is Where the Hatch Is
25.plot: Breeze and Roary swap places for the day (and night). Roary soon discovers the beach is no place for a racing car to live, while Breeze misses the freedom of the beach.

26.title: Putting on a Show
26.plot: The cars are all gleaming for this evening's race. Roary gets bored and heads out onto the track - with disastrous consequences. Will the cars be ready in time for the big show?

27.title: Motor Mouth
27.plot: The track inspector is coming to visit and Big Chris is too tired to commentate on the race. A celebrity commentator is brought in to save the day - much to Big Chris' anger.

28.title: Dancing Queen
28.plot: Christine is due to take part in a dancing competition and is practising at Silver Hatch. But what happens when her dance partner is taken ill?

29.title: Homesick Tin Top
29.plot: Tin Top just can't master corners no matter how hard he tries. The other cars try to help him to no avail... until Roary hits on a brilliant plan.

30.title: Save Our Tree
30.plot: Mr Carburettor is planning on cutting down Flash's tree. What can be done to save the poor rabbit's home?

31.title: New Juice
31.plot: Conrod is visiting Silver Hatch to try out some new bio fuel. But Big Chris fears something is wrong with it after he comes out in spots after sampling a smoothie made from the same produce.

32.title: FB for Football
32.plot: The cars are having a football tournament down at the beach. FB learns that if he relaxes, his natural footballing skills will shine through.

33.title: Mr Carburettor's Birthday Suit
33.plot: Mr Carburettor is off to try out his new wetsuit at the beach... it may come in useful when rain is forecast for the big race the next day!

34.title: Big Bangs
34.plot: Mr Carburettor is planning a big firework display up at the farm. Can Roary help Tin Top overcome his fear of bangs in time for the display?

35.title: Silver Hatch Pizza
35.plot: Mr Carburettor has demanded pizza for lunch but the pizzeria is closed. How is Marsha going to ensure Mr Carburettor gets the lunch he asked for?

36.title: The Silver Hatch Stars
36.plot: Racing tales. Roary feels put out when all the cars pay Conrod too much attention. He is determined to show his worth when they race that afternoon.

37.title: High Tech Overload
37.plot: Big Chris has got a new gadget to monitor the cars. He puts it to the test, what could possibly go wrong?

38.title: Workshop Chaos
38.plot: Big Chris is furious when Marsha tidies up his workshop - how's he supposed to work in these conditions? Luckily Flash saves helps out by messing it up again!

39.title: Silver Hatch Shapes Up
39.plot: Conrod is having an engine tune up at Silver Hatch. He boasts that his spoilers make him faster than all the other cars, who then want to be just as fast as their V8 hero...

40.title: It's Go Go Go at Silver Hatch
40.plot: Murray Walker is visiting Silver Hatch. Mr Carburettor would like him to commentate while the cars put on a stunt display. But Murray has other ideas... he admits he has always dreamed of racing himself.

41.title: Pit Stop Perils
41.plot: Mr Carburettor becomes fed up with Roary and Maxi constantly bickering about who is the fastest, so he decrees that the pair will have a race.

42.title: Demolition Derby
42.plot: Big Chris has a great idea for how Roary can burn up all his excess energy and be helpful at the same time.

43.title: Manners Please
43.plot: Farmer Green and FB are very nervous about going to Mama Mia's garden party, so James and the other cars offer to teach them how to behave.

44.title: Big Chris's Big Jump
44.plot: Racing tales. Big Chris has agreed to do a parachute jump for charity, but he loses his nerve on the big day. Can Roary help him out?

45.title: Crash Landing
45.plot: Hellie makes an emergency landing. Despite everyone's efforts, Hellie won't fly again - what could the problem be?

46.title: Plugger's New Job
46.plot: James has broken down so Mama Mia gets Plugger to run her about. Mama has a wonderful time with Plugger and so James gets jealous.

47.title: Big Chris Get's Lucky
47.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

48.title: Silver Hatch Fun Run
48.plot: Roary and Plugger really want Big Chris to take part in the fun run but Chris isn't so sure. Can they make sure he trains for it

49.title: Silver Hatch Heroes
49.plot: Mr Carburettor's cousin Chubby is coming to Silver hatch as he wants to film his new blockbuster there. Everybody goes all out to prove that it is just the right location for Chubby's new film

50.title: Officer Roary
50.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

51.title: Winter Breeze
51.plot: Winter Breeze: Racing tales. Breeze is visiting the track, so she tries her best to help everyone get ready for Christmas.

52.title: Brassless Band
52.plot: The brass band booked for the Silver Hatch parade have cancelled. Mr Carburettor will be furious if he doesn't have music at his parade. Roary and his friends think up an ingenious plan...

1.title: Roary's First Day
1.plot: One night, Big Chris tells Roary the story of the little red racing car's first day at Silver Hatch. This successfully stops Roary's nightmares about the following day's big race.

2.title: Roary Slips Up
2.plot: Roary has spilled oil all over the track and is told to clean it up. He doesn't do it properly, will the cars manage to avoid the oil as they race round the track?

3.title: Big Chris Flags it Up
3.plot: Marsha is feeling ill and Big Chris sends her home, telling her not to worry, he and Roary will take over her job for the day. Disaster strikes when he mistakes the flags for oily rags... will they be able to find something else to use instead?

4.title: Express Delivery
4.plot: Big Chris is starving but he hasn't got any eggs to make an omelette for breakfast. Roary offers to get some for him from the farm, will he ever get them home without breaking them?

5.title: Roary's Day at the Seaside
5.plot: Roary and Big Chris land themselves in trouble when the visit the beach.

6.title: Roary Takes Off
6.plot: Roary is accidentally filled with balloon gas and begins to float away during a race.

7.title: Cici Takes the Blame
7.plot: Marsha is furious when she finds tyre marks all over her picnic blanket. They look suspiciously like the work of CiCi who is always performing stunts. She is adamant it wasn't her, so who could the real culprit be?

8.title: Big Chris' Big Workout
8.plot: Marsha has challenged Big Chris to a running race. Big Chris doesn't stand a chance against the super fit marshall does he?

9.title: Flash Flips Out
9.plot: Flash is fed up with the constant roar of engine noises and decided to make matters into his own hands, diverting the cars off the track. Will Big Chris and Marsha realise what is happening before one of the cars gets hurt?

10.title: Rusty Remembers
10.plot: Rusty is feeling neglected and unloved. He sadly remembers how life used to be, when he was a young caravan. Roary and the other cars show Rusty how much they care and respect him.

11.title: Easy on the Fuel
11.plot: Silver hatch Race Track has run out of fuel. Maxi doesn't conserve fuel as he is told, will Roary be able to find a way for him to join in the race with the others?

12.title: Communication Breakdown
12.plot: Marsha has forgotten to charge the walkie talkies overnight. How will everybody keep in touch on a busy day at Silver Hatch?

13.title: Blue Light Job
13.plot: Drifter's neon light isn't working and Big Chris is determined he can fix it without the use of a manual. The others aren't so sure, but where could Drifter's manual be?

14.title: Make Up Your Mind Roary
14.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

15.title: Workshop Roary
15.plot: Animated adventures of the cheerful racing car. Roary and Tin Top offer to look after the workshop so that an exhausted Big Chris can have a nap.

16.title: Tip Top Tin Top
16.plot: Tin Top tries his hardest to avoid any scrapes but he crashes just as an important car designer is coming to visit.

17.title: Tunnel Vision
17.plot: Animated adventures of the cheerful racing car. Maxi is not looking forward to the night race because he is scared of Ton-Up Tunnel on the race track.

18.title: Molecom Makes Music
18.plot: The lively racing car and his friends embark on another animated adventure. Molecom longs to emulate Big Chris's talent for music.

19.title: Roary Goes Missing
19.plot: Animated adventures of the cheerful racing car. Roary is fed up of playing by himself on the track and takes himself off on a day out - causing panic at the track.

20.title: Mama Mia
20.plot: Mr Carburettor is in a panic as his mother is coming to visit and he needs everything to be perfect.

21.title: Surround Sound
21.plot: Big Chris' karaoke machine is broken and he needs to rehearse for a big competition. Roary has a brilliant idea how to make music...

22.title: Plugger's on the Case
22.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

23.title: Big Chris Learns to Fly
23.plot: Big Chris has always wanted to fly a helicopter. Disaster strikes when he presses the one button he shouldn't. Will Roary and co manage to get Big Chris back safely to the ground?

24.title: Musical Mayhem
24.plot: Mr Carburettor is off to the opera, but when his transport - Hellie - breaks down, Roary has to come up with a quick solution.

25.title: Braking Promises
25.plot: Maxi is furious when Roary is offered his spare tyre warmers overnight if he is good and tries to make Roary misbehave. Meanwhile, there are strange noises coming from the workshop - is it a ghost?

26.title: Secret Treasures
26.plot: Roary, Tin Top and Drifter are off to the seaside in search of buried treasure, but they are dismayed to find the beach is ruined by litter.

27.title: Roary on Thin Ice
27.plot: There is ice on the track at Silver Hatch. Roary tries desperately to warn everyone but they don't listen. Will he be able to guide the cars round the track safely?

28.title: Drifter's Last Day
28.plot: Roary overhears Big Chris talking to Marsha and thinks that Drifter is about to be sent to the scrapheap. He and his friends pull together to prove to Big Chris that Drifter is a car worth keeping.

29.title: Out of Juice
29.plot: Big Chris has taken delivery of some special water to make the cars run more smoothly, but he only has enough for one car.

30.title: Roary's Wake Up Call
30.plot: Roary's Wake Up Call: Animated adventures of the little racing car. Chaos reigns at Silver Hatch, as Mr Carburettor is staying with Big Chris and insists on getting up very early.

31.title: Big Chris Says Sorry
31.plot: Children's series follows the adventures of racing vehicle Roary and his friends.

32.title: Maxi's New Engine
32.plot: Maxi's engine needs a rebuild, but will it be done before the reporter from Wheels Magazine arrives to do an interview?

33.title: Busy Day for Big Chris
33.plot: Big Chris is doing his best to relax but try as he might, there's always someone who needs his help. With the voices of Peter Kay and Sir Stirling Moss.

34.title: Tin Top Gets Scared
34.plot: Children's series follows the adventures of racing vehicle Roary and his friends.

35.title: Roary Loses a Friend
35.plot: Children's series follows the adventures of racing vehicle Roary and his friends.

36.title: Spooky Forest
36.plot: Roary and Cici are tricked by Maxi into thinking that the forest is haunted, but it's not long before the tables are turned...

37.title: FB in the Fast Lane
37.plot: Animated fun with the cheerful racing car, featuring the voices of Peter Kay and Sir Stirling Moss. An attempt by FB to outrace Maxi ends in disaster.

42.plot: Roary is nervous about racing again after suffering a crash. Big Chris helps him get over his fears.

45.plot: A water shortage at Silver Hatch means there is no water left to run the cars or even to clean them!
